metadata.Paper Title: Shamela: A Large-Scale Historical Arabic Corpus
metadata.Venue Name: North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics
metadata.Abstract: We introduce Shamela, a large-scale historical Arabic corpus consisting of over 17,000 books. The corpus spans multiple centuries and covers a wide range of topics, including literature, history, and religion. We provide a detailed description of the corpus, including its size, content, and characteristics. We also present preliminary results on several NLP tasks, demonstrating the potential of Shamela for a variety of applications. The corpus is publicly available to the research community.
